Function reference

All functions

check_and_unnest()
Check and Unnest an idaifield_docs-list
check_idaifieldr_version()
Check Version of idaifieldR
connect_idaifield()
Connect to an iDAI.field / Field Desktop Client
convert_to_onehot()
Break down a List from a Checkbox Field to Onehot-Coded Values
.onLoad()
onLoad / onAttach
download_language_list()
Download a Language-List from GitHub
find_layer()
Find the Layer a Resource is Contained in
fix_dating()
Reduce the Dating-list to min/max-Values
fix_relations()
Unnest the Relations in a Resource and Replace the UUIDs with identifiers
gather_languages()
Gather Fields with Multiple Language Values
get_configuration()
Get the Custom Project Configuration as Stored in the Project Database
get_field_index()
Get the Index of an iDAI.field / Field Desktop Database
get_field_inputtypes()
Produce a Matrix of Field inputTypes from the Custom Project Configuration
get_idaifield_docs()
Import all docs from an iDAI.field / Field Desktop project
get_language_lookup()
Prepare a Language List as a Lookup Table
get_uid_list()
Get the Index of an idaifield_docs/idaifield_resources-list
idaifield_as_matrix()
Convert an idaifield_simple-list to a Matrix
idaifieldr_demodata
idaifieldR Demodata
idf_get_changes()
See when and by whom selected resources have been created or modified
idf_index_query()
Query docs from an iDAI.field Database Based on an Index (uidlist)
idf_json_query()
Query docs from an iDAI.field Database Based on a JSON-Query
idf_last_changed()
Get a vector of UUIDs or identifiers of the last n changed resources
idf_ping()
Ping the Field-Database
idf_projects()
Get a Vector of Project Names Present in the Database
idf_query()
Query docs from an iDAI.field Database Directly
idf_select_by()
Select/Filter an idaifield_resources- or idaifield_docs-list
idf_sepdim()
Convert a List of Dimensions to Simpler Values
idf_show_categories()
Show the categories Present in an idaifield_docs- or idaifield_resources-list
reformat_geometry()
Reformat the Geometry of a single iDAI.field / Field Desktop resource
remove_config_names()
Remove Everything Before the Colon in a Character Vector
replace_uid()
Replace a Vector of UUIDs with their identifiers
select_by()
Deprecated function: Select/filter an idaifield_resources- or idaifield_docs-list
simplify_idaifield()
Simplify a List Imported from an iDAI.field / Field Desktop-Database

Developed by Lisa Steinmann.
